column4: I tried to apt-get install libgtk2.0-dev but I saw I had unmet dependencies, so I apt-get build-dep'd it, but that returned this
E: Could not open file /var/lib/apt/lists/packages.freecontrib.org_ubuntu_plf_dists_dapper_free_source_Sources - open (2 No such file or directory)
is libgtk2 just impossible to have here
that repos is long gone I suspect
